function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Blockchain and smart contract vulnerabilities could lead to unauthorized access to medical data.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to medical data, compromising patient privacy and confidentiality.","Mitigation":"Regular security audits and updates, multi-factor authentication, secure development practices.","Technologies":"Blockchain, smart contracts, encryption, access control mechanisms.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, medical organizations.","Owner":"IT security team, developers, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Inadequate data replication and distribution could lead to data loss or unavailability.","Impact":"Loss of access to critical medical data, delays in patient care and treatment.","Mitigation":"Implement automated data replication processes, regular data integrity checks, disaster recovery planning.","Technologies":"IPFS, data replication algorithms, disaster recovery solutions.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, medical organizations.","Owner":"IT operations team, system administrators, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Ineffective health information exchange and record retrieval could result in delayed patient care.","Impact":"Delayed access to medical records, hindering patient diagnosis and treatment.","Mitigation":"Standardize health information exchange protocols, improve interoperability of EHR systems, implement efficient record retrieval mechanisms.","Technologies":"Health information exchange protocols, EHR interoperability standards, data retrieval algorithms.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, medical organizations.","Owner":"Health information management team, EHR system developers, healthcare organizations."}]}
